channel.title: Parallel Rcpp on SC2

item.title: 1. Using OpenMP in Rcpp
item.description: Basic examples Parallel random number generation using OpenMP Using OpenMP in R packages body { text-align: justify} Here we describe some basic examples on the use of OpenMP to parallelise Rcpp code. We assume that the reader has some basic familiarity with OpenMP. If you need a refresher, have a look at these notes from the Chris Wood. Basic examples The following Rcpp program simply pauses the system for a sec seconds:
